title: pmq
author: pmq
content: I'm auctioning some of my collectibles here.Pictures: https://1drv.ms/u/s!AjVCYXnqRKrikdcB46eUXfb9xNQHtA?e=EmimHkLocated in EU, shipping based on location and preference. Escrow with minerjones on buyers expense.0.0001BTC minimum bid increments per lot please.End time: July 31st, 2022, 17:00:00 PDTSniping: Any bid made in last 10 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 10 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOTIf within those 10 extended minutes, a new bid is made PER LOT, 10 minutes will be added to that lot from the time of that bid.LOT 1: 2013 Lealana 0.1BTC Silver #3535 MS69 Coin, Funded.Won the Lealana Silver in a raffle, https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1731856.msg17376413A similar coin sold for ~6x face value in an auction house last year, https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5369538.0True, graded higher and 'buyer funded' marking that was supposed to make it ultra rare.Starting bid: 0.125BTCLOT 2: 3pcs Cryptolator Copper 0.1BTC, UnfundedBought those in 2014, https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=864997.msg9652079As seen from the pictures, there are some minor scratches on the plastic capsules, but coins are fine. Never been opened by me.Starting bid: 0.005BTC eachHighest bid (first one, if there are equal bids) gets an extra 0,25BTC DIY serpcoin plus a few aluminium casascius blanks.LOT 3: 5XMR DIY giveaway coin, UnfundedStarting bid: 0.005BTCI will not PM you about any direct payment, beware of scammers.When auction ends, we'll contact minerjones and set up an escrow, sort out shipping etc.

comments.author: tweetious
comments.body: Quote from: pmq on July 25, 2022, 11:26:26 AMHighest bid (first one, if there are equal bids) gets an extra 0,25BTC DIY serpcoin plus a few aluminium casascius blanks.Could you please elaborate on that?IF I understood this correctly, Lot 2 contains "3pcs Cryptolator Copper 0.1BTC, Unfunded". Highest bidder (ie the winner of the lot) wins/gets the 3 Cryptolator coins, an extra 0,25BTC DIY serpcoin plus a few aluminium casascius blanks. The second highest bidder gets nothing.Kinda strange that you distinguish -in LOT2- the lot winner from the highest bid (that gets additional items)

comments.author: pmq
comments.body: Quote from: tweetious on July 25, 2022, 11:50:19 AMCould you please elaborate on that?IF I understood this correctly, Lot 2 contains "3pcs Cryptolator Copper 0.1BTC, Unfunded". Highest bidder (ie the winner of the lot) wins/gets the 3 Cryptolator coins, an extra 0,25BTC DIY serpcoin plus a few aluminium casascius blanks. The second highest bidder gets nothing.Kinda strange that you distinguish -in LOT2- the lot winner from the highest bid (that gets additional items)  Sorry about the confusion, I'm not an experienced seller here.What I meant was, that LOT 2 has 3 similar coins, each with a 0.005BTC starting bid.If user 1 bids 0.005, user 2 bids 0.005, user 3 bids 0.005, user 4 bids 0.0051 then 3 coins would go to:user 4 @ 0.0051BTC (also the high bid that gets those additional items)user 1 @ 0.005BTCuser 2 @ 0.005BTC

comments.author: tweetious
comments.body: Quote from: pmq on July 25, 2022, 11:57:17 AMQuote from: tweetious on July 25, 2022, 11:50:19 AMCould you please elaborate on that?IF I understood this correctly, Lot 2 contains "3pcs Cryptolator Copper 0.1BTC, Unfunded". Highest bidder (ie the winner of the lot) wins/gets the 3 Cryptolator coins, an extra 0,25BTC DIY serpcoin plus a few aluminium casascius blanks. The second highest bidder gets nothing.Kinda strange that you distinguish -in LOT2- the lot winner from the highest bid (that gets additional items)  Sorry about the confusion, I'm not an experienced seller here.What I meant was, that LOT 2 has 3 similar coins, each with a 0.005BTC starting bid.If user 1 bids 0.005, user 2 bids 0.005, user 3 bids 0.005, user 4 bids 0.0051 then 3 coins would go to:user 4 @ 0.0051BTC (also the high bid that gets those additional items)user 1 @ 0.005BTCuser 2 @ 0.005BTCThanks for the elaborationDoes LOT3 contain all 5 coins? If I place the winning bid, will I get 5 XMR DIY coins (or just 1)?

comments.author: pmq
comments.body: Quote from: tweetious on July 25, 2022, 12:05:36 PMThanks for the elaborationDoes LOT3 contain all 5 coins? If I place the winning bid, will I get 5 XMR DIY coins (or just 1)?Another misunderstanding, I'm really not good at this LOT 3 has one coin with a face value of 5XMR, unfunded.
